questions.question: The accuracy of the deflection type instruments and of the null type instruments depends on

answers.b: Calibration of spring, linearity, and calibration of weights
answers.c: Linearity and calibration of spring, calibration of weights
answers.d: Both depends on calibration of weight

questions.question: A dead-weight pressure gauge is used for ______.

answers.a: greater than atmospheric pressure + gauge pressure
answers.b: equal to atmospheric pressure + gauge pressure
answers.c: greater than atmospheric pressure - absolute pressure
answers.d: equal to atmospheric pressure - absolute pressure

questions.question: Which is the only unknown value in the dead weight tester?
Which oil is used in dead weight tester?
